title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Matt Mosley on Dak Woes, Mary Kay Cabot on Baker Complaints, OBJ Divorce, Week 15 NFL Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Matt Mosley on Dak Woes, Mary Kay Cabot on Baker Complaints, OBJ Divorce, Week 15 NFL Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin to look at what's wrong with Dak (3:00) why he fails in comparison to the other top QBs (12:00), and how the rest of the Cowboys season will play out (14:00). Then, longtime Browns beat writer Mary Kay Cabot discusses the "philosophical disconnect" between Baker and his offense (20:00), the inside story behind OBJ's struggles in Cleveland and the moment she knew Odell's time was up (27:00), and why Baker has been speaking out lately (34:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his week 15 Packers/Ravens (38:00), Patriots/Colts (40:00), picks are "sharp" or "square".

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
